com.bigtobster.pgnextractalt.commands

Class TagCommands

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigtobster.pgnextractalt.commands.TagCommands
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.shell.core.CommandMarker

    @Component
public class TagCommands
extends Object
implements org.springframework.shell.core.CommandMarker
    Spring Shell Command class for Modifying PGN Tags Created by Toby Leheup on 15/01/16 for pgn-extract-alt.
    Author:
    Toby Leheup (Bigtobster)

      • listWritableTags

        @CliCommand(value="list-writable-tags",
            help="Lists all the tags that PGN-Extract-Alt can insert into games")
public String listWritableTags()
        Returns a formatted output of all the tags that can be used
        Returns:
        The formatted output of all the tags that can be used

      • insertTag

        @CliCommand(value="insert-tag",
            help="Insert a tag into list of games. Available when games imported. New tag must be a recognised PGN tag.")
public String insertTag(@CliOption(key="TagKey",mandatory=true,help="The key of the tag to be inserted.")
                                                                                                                                                                                  String tagKey,
                                                                                                                                                                                  @CliOption(key="TagValue",mandatory=true,help="The value of the tag to be inserted.")
                                                                                                                                                                                  String tagValue,
                                                                                                                                                                                  @CliOption(key="Force",mandatory=false,help="\"true\" to overwrite any existing tags with this key",unspecifiedDefaultValue="false")
                                                                                                                                                                                  boolean forceInsert)
        Handle the interface for inserting a tag into a list of games
        Parameters:
        tagKey - The key of the tag to be inserted
        tagValue - The value of the tag to be inserted
        forceInsert - Whether to overwrite existing tags of that key
        Returns:
        Success message

      • isInsertTagAvailable

        @CliAvailabilityIndicator(value="insert-tag")
public boolean isInsertTagAvailable()
        Describes when "Insert Tag" command is available
        Returns:
        boolean Availability (Available on successful import of at least 1 game)

      • islistWritableTagsAvailable

        @CliAvailabilityIndicator(value="list-writable-tags")
public static boolean islistWritableTagsAvailable()
        Describes when "List Writable Tags" command is available
        Returns:
        boolean Availability (Always available))
